text: Ernesto Laclau (; 6 October 1935 â€“ 13 April 2014) was an Argentine political theorist. He was a post-Marxist. His career began in 1986 as a professor at the University of Essex. He was born in Buenos Aires. Laclau died of a heart attack in Seville, Spain, aged 78. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Essex Category:Argentine academics Category:Scientists from Buenos Aires
title: Ernesto Laclau
